remarks: The value of the "edge function" of a graph is a uniquely determined set containing two elements (the endvertices of the corresponding edge). Concretising ~ usgraedg4 .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)
statement:
usgraedgreu $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ X e. dom E /\ Y e. ( E ` X ) ) -> E! y e. V ( E ` X ) = { Y , y } ) $.
$d E y $.
$d V y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y y $.
